Easily classify images and text

Nyckel's classification API makes it simple to automatically tag anything using your own rules and labels.

For 90% of use cases, AI/ML tools are needlessly complex

Nyckel isn't trying to be everything to everyone. Instead, we're hyper-focused on one powerful AI use case: image and text classification. Our vision is to make it as easy as possible to auto-label content at scale.

Use AI to auto-label content using your rules and your data

Binary

Given two options, which one is it?

Single-Label

Given many options, which one is it?

Multi-Label

Of a list of options, how many fit?

Takes just 5 minutes

No need to spend cycles understanding complicated, feature-heavy AI/ML tools. Spin up a classification model in just minutes.

1. Sign up and upload data

Sign up for free and upload as few as 5-10 samples per label

2. Let it train (5s-30s)

Trains almost immediately. You'll see how accurate it was against the training data

3. Ping the API

Send a request with an unlabeled image, text, or dataset, and we'll respond with the right label
